__e: It was a perfect evening, just the way it was.
It's such a perfect evening. lsn't this how you always pictured it?
You feel badly that he had a row with his friend, but otherwise, all you remember is that it was perfect.
Not even 7 am... and already a perfect day.
It was a perfect day and he ruined it.
It was... the perfect day for a child.
You've been a perfect gentleman... but that could be taken the wrong way, you know.
Listen, Mike, about the whole seeing me naked thing, I... I just want to thank you for being such a perfect gentleman.
Perhaps somewhat less than a perfect gentleman, but alive!
Sorry, I know it's not a well thought-out plan, but we have to leave.
Hey, "A good plan violently executed this week is better than a perfect plan executed next week."
Well, it's not a perfect plan, but it's all I've got.
Perfect ground for us to do our work quietly.
A perfect place for a guy to spin on his head. Added twist:
Great place to meet three other guys as angry as you, looking for a little payback.
